events.message: I received my order yesterday but unfortunately I want to request a refund as the item does not meet my expectations.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's message about wanting money back.
The refund request case has been assigned to a customer support agent specialized in returns and refunds.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
Could you also let us know the reason why you are requesting a refund so we can process it accordingly?
Sure, my order number is 12345678. The product didn't work as described and I’m not satisfied with its quality.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process right away, and you should receive the money back within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for the prompt response. I appreciate the quick resolution and look forward to the refund.
We have successfully processed your refund. Please check your account in a few days and reach out if you have any further questions.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory.
As we have not received further concerns, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting our support.
We sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our customer service. Your feedback is valuable to us.
